DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect combine whey protein creatine supplement , compare whey protein supplement alone , change upper low body strength .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Using Whey Protein Creatine Supplements Muscular Strength Weight-training Adult Males
DOC.criteria: Recreationally active male Age 18 35 year BMI 19 29.9 kg/m2 Weight train 3 4 time week least 6 month trial Participants medical condition include active heart disease , high blood pressure , renal hepatic impairment type I II diabetes , bipolar disease , pulmonary disease , thyroid disease , immune disorder , psychiatric disorder Dietary herbal supplement use past 60 day increase muscle mass Use protein supplement past 7 day Use thermogenic supplement beverage past 7 day Use Nonsteroidal anti inflammatory drug corticosteroid past 7 day
